original: Once upon a time, in the realm beyond, where darkness overshadowed light, Satan found himself facing an unfamiliar challenge: single parenthood to the offspring sacrificed to him. As the Lord of Darkness, he had ruled with an iron fist, imposing fear and despair into the hearts of mortals. However, when his sinister followers began offering him their innocent children, Satan's perspective shifted

As the Lord of Darkness, he had ruled with an stern hold, imposing fear and despair into the hearts amid mortals. However, when his sinister followers began offering him their innocent children, Satan's perspective shifted
